required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Female Sexual Function and Back Pain

brief_summary.textblock: Back pa覺n is a common hormonal disorder in women that may affect the phases of female sexual function (FSD). We investigated sexual function in patients with back pa覺n A total of 54 women with back pa覺n and 27 age matched voluntary healthy women who served as the as control group were evaluated with a detailed medical and sexual history, including a female sexual function index (FSFI) questionnaire and the Beck Depression Inventory. Serum prolactin, dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate, free testosterone, androstenedione, 17alpha-hydroxyprogesterone, estradiol, free thyroxin and thyrotropin were measured. These variables were compared statistically between the 2 groups.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 54 women with back pa覺n and 27 age matched voluntary healthy women who served as the as control group were evaluated with a detailed medical and sexual history, including a female sexual function index (FSFI) questionnaire and the Beck Depression Inventory. Serum prolactin, dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate, free testosterone, androstenedione, 17alpha-hydroxyprogesterone, estradiol, free thyroxin and thyrotropin were measured. These variables were compared statistically between the 2 groups.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 20-45 year old
- Female
- Active sexual life
Exclusion Criteria:
- Younger than 20, older than 45 year old.
- Menopause
